purpleculture_pinyin:
táng
dyke; embankment; pool or pond; hot-water bathing pool
дамба; набережная; бассейн или пруд; бассейн с горячей водой
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 唐 indicates the sound; 土 (earth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
池塘 [ chí táng ]: pool; pond
水塘 [ shuǐ táng ]: pool
火塘 [ huǒ táng ]: indoor fire pit
塘堰 [ táng yàn ]: irrigation pond or dam
观塘 [ guàn táng ]: Kwun Tong district of Kowloon, Hong Kong

heisig_chinese_memo: After the storm there was a pool of tangy stuff in the ground.  I thought, maybe it will give me super powers.  On second thought, maybe I'll turn green and drop dead on the spot, so I left.
Ru_trainchinese: táng: (графема) пруд; плотина, дамба; водоем в виде пруда
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: After the storm there was a pool of tangy stuff in the ground.  I thought, maybe it will give me super powers.  On second thought, maybe I'll turn green and drop dead on the spot, so I left.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " earth " to " Tang " sound. The original meaning is dike, embankment. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Tang, Embankment. Congtu, Tang Sheng." "Jade Chapter. "Tube": "Pond, pond also." Such as "Huainanzi. "Zhushu": "Fish catches the water and swimming in the water makes you happy. If the pond runs out of water, it is eaten by the ants." "Book of the Later Han Dynasty. Biographies of Fang Shu: "(Xu) Yang Yin went up and down, and he built the pond for more than four hundred miles, and he stood for a few years."

The extension of " pond " means a pond or pond. "Guang Ya. "Shidi": "Pond, pond." In ancient times, the square was called " pond ", and the round was called " pool ." Such as "Selected Works. Liu Gongqian "Gift to Xu Gan": "The thin willows clamp Taosheng, the Fangtang contains the clear source." Beizhou Yuxin's "Aijiangnan Fu": "Fangtang water is white, fishing Zhuchi is round."
humanum_short_description_en: From " earth " to " Tang " sound. The original meaning is embankment and embankment, and the extension means pond and pond.
humanum_full_description:
從「土」，「唐」聲。本義是堤防、堤岸。《說文新附》：「塘，隄也。从土，唐聲。」《玉篇．土部》：「塘，隄塘也。」如《淮南子．主術》：「魚得水而游焉則樂，塘決水涸，則為螻蟻所食。」《後漢書．方術列傳》：「（許）楊因高下形埶，起塘四百餘里，數年乃立。」

　　「塘」引申表示水池、池塘。《廣雅．釋地》：「塘，池也。」古代以方者為「塘」，圓者為「池」。如《文選．劉公幹〈贈徐幹〉》：「細柳夾道生，方塘含清源。」北周庾信〈哀江南賦〉：「方塘水白，釣渚池圓。」
humanum_short_description: 從「土」，「唐」聲。本義是堤防、堤岸，引申表示水池、池塘。

從「 土 」，「 唐 」聲。本義是堤防、堤岸。《說文新附》：「塘，隄也。从土，唐聲。」《玉篇．土部》：「塘，隄塘也。」如《淮南子．主術》：「魚得水而游焉則樂，塘決水涸，則為螻蟻所食。」《後漢書．方術列傳》：「（許）楊因高下形埶，起塘四百餘里，數年乃立。」 「 塘 」引申表示水池、池塘。《廣雅．釋地》：「塘，池也。」古代以方者為「 塘 」，圓者為「 池 」。如《文選．劉公幹〈贈徐幹〉》：「細柳夾道生，方塘含清源。」北周庾信〈哀江南賦〉：「方塘水白，釣渚池圓。」

"Zhushu": "Fish catches the water and swimming in the water makes you happy. If the pond runs out of water, it is eaten by the ants." "Book of the Later Han Dynasty. Biographies of Fang Shu: "(Xu) Yang Yin went up and down, and he built the pond for more than four hundred miles, and he stood for a few years." The extension of " pond" means a pond or pond. "Guang Ya. "Shidi": "Pond, pond." In ancient times, the square was called " pond", and the round was called " pool." Such as "Selected Works. Liu Gongqian "Gift to Xu Gan": "The thin willows clamp Taosheng, the Fangtang contains the clear source." Beizhou Yuxin's "Aijiangnan Fu": "Fangtang water is white, fishing Zhuchi is round."

塘字的基本解释

塘
táng
堤岸，堤防：塘坝。塘堰。河塘。海塘。
水池：池塘。荷塘。鱼塘。苇塘。
某些地区在室内挖小坑用来生火：火塘。

塘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［táng］
［《廣韻》徒郎切，平唐，定。］
(1)堤岸；堤防。
(2)土筑的大道。泛指大道。
(3)水池。
(4)驿站关卡。
(5)特指浴池。
(6)方言。火塘。

塘字的英文翻译

◎ 塘
dyke, embankment, pond, pool

塘字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　塘； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页235第22
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?徒郞切，音唐。?也。築土遏水曰塘。【吳越春秋】夫差姑蘇臺東，丹湖萬頃，內有金銀塘。　又【錢塘志】曹華信立防海塘，募致土石一斛與錢一千，來者如雲。乃曰：不復需土。皆棄而去。塘成，因名錢塘。　又瞿塘，在夔州東。【方輿勝覽】瞿塘，古西陵峽，乃三峽之門。【杜甫詩】衆水會培萬，瞿塘第一門。　通作唐。

塘字的源字形

塘字的起名意思

：原意是挡水的土坝。堤岸、堤防、塘坝、塘堰。后通称为池塘，水塘等。

Basic explanation of words
pond
táng
Embankment, embankment: pond dam. Tangyan. River pond. Seawall.
Pool: pond. Lotus pond. Fish pond. Weitang.
In some areas, small pits are dug indoors to light fires: fire pits.
pond
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［táng］
["Guangyun" Tu Langqie, Ping Tang, Ding. ]
(1) Embankment; embankment.
(2) The earth-built avenue. Refers to the avenue in general.
(3) The pool.
(4) Post station checkpoint.
(5) Especially referring to baths.
(6) Dialects. Fire pond.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　 Tang; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 235 22
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Tu Yunqie, Yin Tang. ?and also. To build soil to contain water is called a pond. [Wu Yue Chun Qiu] Fu Cha Gu Su Taitung, Dan Lake is ten thousand hectares, and there is a pond of gold and silver inside.　[Qiantangzhi] Cao Huaxin set up a defense against the seawall and raised a thousand dollars of earth and stone and a thousand dollars. Those who come are like clouds. Nai said: No more soil is needed. All abandoned. Tang Cheng, because of the name Qiantang.　 Qutang again, in the east of Kuizhou. [Fang Yusheng View] Qutang, the ancient Xiling Gorge, is the gate of the Three Gorges. [Poems of Du Fu] All waters will be Peiwan, the first gate in Qutang.　Tong made Tang.
pond
Source glyph
pond
Name meaning
: The original intent was an earth dam for retaining water. Embankment, embankment, pond dam, pond weir. Later known as ponds, ponds and so on.
塘
会意字。从土,古文字形体像地面有堆土,表示用泥土石块来筑堤岸;从唐,唐有广大的样子义,表示堤岸广阔;唐
(tang)兼表声。本义是堤岸。

С почвы древние иероглифы похожи на груды земли на земле, что означает, что насыпь построена из глины и камней; от Тан Тан имеет обширный вид, что означает, что насыпь широкая; Тан также звук.
